column4: It's great that dell has the best support.. except they have 100x the problems
so no shit they need good support
It's like.. how about we just make a good product from the start and we don't need a 10,000 person support department
100 bux for a no name PSU
ya.. cuz their computer suck so fucking bad.. they need a crazy support program
All I'm saying is if they'd just get a custom built machine
they'd have 100x less problems then their dell

Unfortunately there isn't much in the way of well-built reasonably-priced hardware for home consumers. And you don't 'get' a custom-built machine. You build a custom-built machine. People don't know how and don't have time for the hassle.
I have about 3 places within 15 minutes that build machines for you. so yes you do "get" them.
So i dunno wtf you're smoking.
I build mine as well. But the average consumer doesn't know what parts are what. And trusting a mom-and-pop shop to choose for them is at least as risky as trusting Dell.
